entries.name: Age
entries: Orog reach maturity by the age of 12 and can live up to 85 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Orogs are an intelligent and pragmatic group, especially for orcs. Most but not all are evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Orogs are larger than regular orcs, standing between 6 and 7 feet tall and average about 300 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Orog Smithing
entries: Throughout the years lived in the depths of the Underdark, orogs have become masters of forging weapons and armor using unique Underdark ores. You have proficiency with artisan's tools ({@item smith's tools|phb}).

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: War Magic
entries: You know the booming blade cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the cause fear spell once with this trait. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the enlarge/reduce spell on yourself once with this trait, using only the spell's enlarge option. Once you cast a non-cantrip spell with this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write {@language Orc|PHB} and your choice between {@language Common|PHB} and {@language Undercommon|PHB}.
